messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I live with my wife Brenda in Elmer. My active involvement in the West Sussex community has made me acutely aware of the problems we face in this constituency. It is clear to me that decisions are being made against the wishes of the people contrary to the Localism Act. Our green spaces are under threat. Flooding problems and coastal erosion persist. I very much believe that this country can govern itself free from the shackles of the EU and that urgent political reform is required.

issues.brexitEurope: I very much believe that this country can govern itself free from the shackles of the EU
issues.environment: Our green spaces are under threat.

housing.content: Flooding problems and coastal erosion persist.

images.caption: GRAHAM JONES in Bognor Regis and Littlehampton - Standing Up for Real Change
